TASK.NAME: cn.com.servyou.platform.sb.dao.sjgt3.impl.SbKdqhztlxxDaoImpl.queryFzjgDfpYzl
TASK.DESCRIPTION: 查询金税三期数据库中的跨省合资铁路表--查询分支机构待分配预征率

SQL.NAME: query_jssq_fzjgdfpyzl
SQL.CLAUSE: select t.fpbl from HX_ZGXT.SB_KSHZTLSSSRFPBLWH t where t.nsrsbh = ?

TASK.NAME: cn.com.servyou.platform.sb.dao.sjgt3.impl.SbKdqhztlxxDaoImpl.queryZcdKshztlqyzg
TASK.DESCRIPTION: 查询金税三期数据库中的跨省合资铁路表--查询注册地跨省合资铁路企业资格

SQL.NAME: query_jssq_zcdkshztlqyzg
SQL.CLAUSE: select count(1) from HX_ZGXT.SB_KSHZTLSSSRFPBLWH t where t.nsrsbh = ?
